metadata.synopsis: Banter between Wyll and Halsin in a creepy mansion.

0.speaker: Wyll
0.text: Father always shooed me away from this place. 'More rats than a Waterdeep dungeon.'
0.context: NodeContext: A little defensive on behalf of rats in general

1.speaker: Halsin
1.text: It is most unfair to pour such scorn on rats - they have their place in nature, same as you or I.
1.context: NodeContext: A little defensive on behalf of rats in general

2.speaker: Wyll
2.text: And I don't get the sense that my father was being literal.
